bibl.author: Kierman, Frank, A., Jr.
Fairbank, John, K.
bibl.title: Chinese Ways in Warfare
bibl.note: The papers in this volume illustrate the richness and subtlety of the Chinese martial tradition, including the civilian containment of the military institution and the Chinese synthesis of psychology and manoeuvre evident from the Sun-tzu to Mao Tse-tung. Refer to Chap. 2.
